Fix usb not available in Virtual box with host Ubuntu 18.04
  • linux
Apr 26, 2020

If you encounter that your virtualbox doesn’t detect any USB port of your host, and you know that you already installed the Virtualbox extension pack, try to add your username into vboxusers with this command:

sudo adduser $USER vboxusers

After that, logout and login back. It works for me I hope it works for you too.
